The future of artificial intelligence  is here
There is a lot of talk about how AI is going to disrupt the world and we are already seeing it. The question is, is AI a disruptive technology or a transformational one?
The answer is, it’s both. AI is a disruptive technology because it is a disruptive technology.  The good news is that AI can help us make our lives easier and more efficient.
The bad news is that AI can also make our lives more difficult and less efficient. The bad news is that AI can also make our lives more difficult and less efficient.
